name: AVCaptionDimension
desc: A structure that defines a caption dimension.

items.name: var value: CGFloat
items.desc: The value of the coordinate or length.

items.name: var units: AVCaptionUnitsType
items.desc: The units of the coordinate, such as cells or points.

items.name: enum AVCaptionUnitsType
items.desc: A structure that defines a units for caption formats.

items.name: init(value: CGFloat, units: AVCaptionUnitsType)
items.desc: Creates a caption dimension with a value and unit type.
